com.dev.yvgenijsharovskij.n5kanjiandkanjistoryquiz.apppreferences

Class AppPreferences

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.dev.yvgenijsharovskij.n5kanjiandkanjistoryquiz.apppreferences.AppPreferences

  • public class AppPreferences
extends java.lang.Object
    This is a data model class for the AppPreferences View, which holds the associated user-customizable preference values. This is a singleton class, which will exists as long as the application stays in memory.
    Since:
    1.0
    Author:
    Yvgenij Sharovskij

    • Method Detail

      • getInstance

        public static AppPreferences getInstance(android.content.Context context)
        If the instance already exists, then getInstance(Context) simply returns the instance. If the instance does not exist yet, then getInstance(Context) will call the constructor to create it.
        Uses lazy initialization, whereby the instance is created when the static method is first invoked. Declared with Draconian synchronization.
        Parameters:
        context - Context
        Returns:
        instance of AppPreferences

      • getQuestionColor

        public int getQuestionColor(android.content.Context context)
        Returns the question text color. Used to programmatically set the mQuestionTextView TextView color as it appears in the QNA_fragment class. The question text color is an int value, which is retrieved from either:
        1. the default XML value from R.colors
        2. the user-defined SharedPreferences value, set via the ColorPickerPreference class
        Parameters:
        context - Context
        Returns:
        int color value for the question

      • setQuestionColor

        public void setQuestionColor(int questionColor)
        Sets the question text color in the SharedPreferences.
        Parameters:
        questionColor - int color value for the question

      • getAnswerColor

        public int getAnswerColor(android.content.Context context)
        Returns the answer text color. Used to programmatically set the mAnswerTextView TextView color as it appears in the QNA_fragment class. The question text color is an int value, which is retrieved from either:
        1. the default XML value from R.colors
        2. the user-defined SharedPreferences value, set via the ColorPickerPreference class
        Parameters:
        context - Context
        Returns:
        int color value for the answer

      • setAnswerColor

        public void setAnswerColor(int answerColor)
        Sets the answer text color in the SharedPreferences.
        Parameters:
        answerColor - int color value for the answer

      • isShowingQNAProgressBar

        public int isShowingQNAProgressBar()
        Returns the isShowingQNAProgressBar boolean value directly from the SharedPreferences.
        Returns:
        true, if the QNA progress bar should be shown during the quiz

      • setShowingQNAProgressBar

        public void setShowingQNAProgressBar(int isShowingQNAProgressBar)
        Sets the isShowingQNAProgressBar boolean value in the SharedPreferences. Specifies if the QNA progress bar should be shown during the quiz.
        Parameters:
        isShowingQNAProgressBar - 1, if the QNA progress bar should be shown during the quiz

      • isVibrationEnabled

        public int isVibrationEnabled()
        Returns the isVibrationEnabled boolean value directly from the SharedPreferences.
        Returns:
        true, if the vibration has been enabled during the quiz

      • setIsVibrationEnabled

        public void setIsVibrationEnabled(int isVibrationEnabled)
        Sets the isVibrationEnabled boolean value in the SharedPreferences.
        Parameters:
        isVibrationEnabled - 1, if the vibration should be enabled during the quiz

      • isIncludingN4FalseAnswers

        public boolean isIncludingN4FalseAnswers()
        Returns the mIsIncludingN4FalseAnswers boolean value directly from the SharedPreferences.
        Returns:
        true, if the user selected to include the N4 level content in the list of false answers in the quiz

      • setIsIncludingN4FalseAnswers

        public void setIsIncludingN4FalseAnswers(boolean isIncludingN4FalseAnswers)
        Sets the mIsIncludingN4FalseAnswers boolean value in the SharedPreferences.
        Parameters:
        isIncludingN4FalseAnswers - true, if the user selected to include the N4 level content in the list of false answers in the quiz

      • isIncludingN4FalseAnswersWithN4Distribution

        public boolean isIncludingN4FalseAnswersWithN4Distribution()
        Returns the mIsIncludingN4FalseAnswersWithN4Distribution boolean value directly from the SharedPreferences.
        Returns:
        true, if the user selected to include the N4 level content with more even N5 sample size distribution in the list of false answers in the quiz

      • setIsIncludingN4FalseAnswersWithN4Distribution

        public void setIsIncludingN4FalseAnswersWithN4Distribution(boolean isIncludingN4FalseAnswersWithN4Distribution)
        Sets the mIsIncludingN4FalseAnswersWithN4Distribution boolean value in the SharedPreferences. Specifies if the user selected to include the N4 level content with even N5 sample size distribution in the list of false answers in the quiz.
        Parameters:
        isIncludingN4FalseAnswersWithN4Distribution - if the user selected to include the N4 level content with even N5 sample size distribution in the list of false answers in the quiz.

      • isIncludingDuplicatePositiveQuestion

        public boolean isIncludingDuplicatePositiveQuestion()
        Returns the mIsIncludingDuplicatePositiveQuestion boolean value directly from the SharedPreferences.
        Returns:
        true, if the user selected to include a duplicate positive question in the quiz

      • setIsIncludingDuplicatePositiveQuestion

        public void setIsIncludingDuplicatePositiveQuestion(boolean isIncludingDuplicatePositiveQuestion)
        Sets the mIsIncludingDuplicatePositiveQuestion boolean value in the SharedPreferences. Specifies if the user selected to include a duplicate positive question in the quiz.
        Parameters:
        isIncludingDuplicatePositiveQuestion - true, if the user selected to include a duplicate positive question in the quiz

      • areAllPrefsSetToDefaultValues

        public boolean areAllPrefsSetToDefaultValues()
        Checks if every Preference on the "Settings" page is set to its default value.
        Used for the AppPreferencesOnResetDialog reset.
        Returns:
        Boolean: true, if every Preference in the AppPreferences is set to its default value.
